location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Bahreini pilgrims on board the Khalifa.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:151 x 190 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘33’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This photograph shows Bahraini pilgrims on board the Khalifa. The foreground and middle-ground are filled with male and female passengers, mostly seated and huddled together, with their belongings in straw baskets and cloth bundles.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Bahreini pilgrims on board the Khalifa.'
